00013 #define DEF_INPUT_BUFFER_SIZE 2048
00014 #define REQUEST_HTTP_PUT 0
00015 #define REQUEST_HTTP_POST 1
00016 
00017 static int _defaultInputBufferSize = DEF_INPUT_BUFFER_SIZE;
00018 
00019 static struct curl_slist* _header;
00020 
00025 static size_t inputWriter(char* inputData,
00026                           size_t size,
00027                           size_t nmemb,
00028                           void* arg)
00029 {
00030     CURL_EXT* handle = (CURL_EXT*) arg;
00031     size_t newDataSize = size * nmemb;
00032 
00033     log_debug("CURL inputWriter: New data block size %d, free %d, total %d.",
00034               newDataSize, handle->inputBufferFree, handle->inputBufferSize);
00035 
00036     if (newDataSize > handle->inputBufferFree)
00037     {
00038         log_warning("CURL inputWriter: allocating memory for input buffer. "
00039                     "Change default buffer size if you often see this message!");
00040 
00041         while (newDataSize > handle->inputBufferFree)
00042         {
00043             handle->inputBufferSize += _defaultInputBufferSize;
00044             handle->inputBufferFree += _defaultInputBufferSize;
00045         }
00046 
00047         handle->inputBuffer = (char*) realloc(handle->inputBuffer,
00048                                               handle->inputBufferSize);
00049         if (handle->inputBuffer == NULL)
00050         {
00051             log_error("CURL inputWriter: Unable to allocate new space "
00052                       "for input buffer.");
00053             return 0;
00054         }
00055     }
00056     // append data to the end of buffer
00057     strncat(handle->inputBuffer, inputData, newDataSize);
00058     handle->inputBufferFree -= newDataSize;
00059     return newDataSize;
00060 }
00061 
00066 static size_t outputReader(char *outputData,
00067                            size_t size,
00068                            size_t nmemb,
00069                            void* arg)
00070 {
00071     CURL_EXT* handle = (CURL_EXT*) arg;
00072     //calculate total available place at outputData
00073     size = size * nmemb;
00074     //number of bytes waiting to be sent
00075     size_t bytesToSend = (handle->outputSize - handle->outputPos);
00076     log_debug("CURL outputReader: sending new data portion. pos=%d; total=%d.",
00077               handle->outputPos, handle->outputSize);
00078     if (size < bytesToSend)
00079     {
00080         bytesToSend = size;
00081     }
00082 
00083     memcpy(outputData,
00084            (handle->outputBuffer + handle->outputPos),
00085            bytesToSend);
00086 
00087     handle->outputPos += bytesToSend;
00088 
00089     return bytesToSend;
00090 }
00091 
00092 static void curl_ext_freeMemory(CURL_EXT* handle)
00093 {
00094     if (handle != NULL)
00095     {
00096         if (handle->curl != NULL)
00097         {
00098             curl_easy_cleanup(handle->curl);
00099         }
00100         if (handle->errorBuffer != NULL)
00101         {
00102             free(handle->errorBuffer);
00103         }
00104         if (handle->inputBuffer != NULL)
00105         {
00106             free(handle->inputBuffer);
00107         }
00108         free(handle);
00109     }
00110 }
00111 
00112 static CURL_EXT* curl_ext_allocateMemory()
00113 {
00114     // allocate space for new handle
00115     CURL_EXT* handle = (CURL_EXT*) malloc(sizeof(CURL_EXT));
00116     if (handle == NULL)
00117     {
00118         return NULL;
00119     }
00120     // initialize default values
00121     handle->curl = NULL;
00122     handle->errorBuffer = NULL;
00123     handle->inputBuffer = NULL;
00124     handle->inputBufferFree = _defaultInputBufferSize - 1;
00125     handle->inputBufferSize = _defaultInputBufferSize;
00126     handle->outputBuffer = NULL;
00127     handle->outputPos = 0;
00128     handle->outputSize = 0;
00129 
00130     // allocate space for buffers
00131     handle->errorBuffer = (char*) malloc(CURL_ERROR_SIZE);
00132     if (handle->errorBuffer == NULL)
00133     {
00134         curl_ext_freeMemory(handle);
00135         return NULL;
00136     }
00137     *(handle->errorBuffer) = '\0';
00138 
00139     handle->inputBuffer = (char*) malloc(_defaultInputBufferSize);
00140     if (handle->inputBuffer == NULL)
00141     {
00142         curl_ext_freeMemory(handle);
00143         return NULL;
00144     }
00145 
00146     return handle;
00147 }
00148 
00149 int curl_ext_init(int defaultInputBufferSize)
00150 {
00151     if (defaultInputBufferSize > 0)
00152     {
00153         _defaultInputBufferSize = defaultInputBufferSize;
00154     }
00155 
00156     CURLcode code = curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT);
00157     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00158     {
00159         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL: "
00160                   "curl_global_init() returned %d.", code);
00161         return -1;
00162     }
00163 
00164     // TODO what about reading this from settings file also?
00165     // all requests are in xml
00166     _header = curl_slist_append(_header, "Content-Type: text/xml");
00167     // disable default header for PUT requests "Expect: 100-continue"
00168     _header = curl_slist_append(_header, "Expect:");
00169 
00170     return 0;
00171 }
00172 
00173 void curl_ext_dispose()
00174 {
00175     curl_global_cleanup();
00176 
00177     // cleanup custom headers
00178     curl_slist_free_all(_header);
00179     _header = NULL;
00180 }

00182 int curl_ext_create(CURL_EXT** handle)
00183 {
00184     // allocate space for new handle
00185     CURL_EXT* h = curl_ext_allocateMemory();
00186     if (h == NULL)
00187     {
00188         log_error("Unable to allocate memory for CURL handle.");
00189         return -2;
00190     }
00191 
00192     // Initialize CURL connection
00193     CURL* curl = curl_easy_init();
00194     if (curl == NULL)
00195     {
00196         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle.");
00197         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00198         return -1;
00199     }
00200 
00201     CURLcode code = curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_ERRORBUFFER, h->errorBuffer);
00202     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00203     {
00204         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle: "
00205                   "Failed to set error buffer (%d).", code);
00206         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00207         return -1;
00208     }
00209 
00210     code = curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, _header);
00211     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00212     {
00213         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle: "
00214                   "Failed to set custom header (%d).", code);
00215         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00216         return -1;
00217     }
00218 
00219     // Set incoming data handler (is called by curl to write down
00220     // received data)
00221     code = curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, &inputWriter);
00222     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00223     {
00224         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle: "
00225                   "Failed to set input writer (%d).", code);
00226         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00227         return -1;
00228     }
00229 
00230     // argument which will be provided to the input writer
00231     code = curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, h);
00232     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00233     {
00234         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle: "
00235                   "Failed to set input buffer (%d).", code);
00236         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00237         return -1;
00238     }
00239 
00240     // Set output reader function (is called by curl to read
00241     // body of request from buffer)
00242     code = curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, &outputReader);
00243     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00244     {
00245         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle: "
00246                   "Failed to set output reader (%d).", code);
00247         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00248         return -1;
00249     }
00250 
00251     // argument which will be provided to the output reader
00252     code = curl_easy_setopt(curl, CURLOPT_READDATA, h);
00253     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00254     {
00255         log_error("Unable to initialize CURL handle: "
00256                   "Failed to set output data (%d).", code);
00257         curl_ext_freeMemory(h);
00258         return -1;
00259     }
00260 
00261     h->curl = curl;
00262     *handle = h;
00263 
00264     return 0;
00265 }
00266 
00267 void curl_ext_free(CURL_EXT* handle)
00268 {
00269     curl_ext_freeMemory(handle);
00270 }
00271 
00276 static int sendRequest(CURL_EXT* handle, const char* uri)
00277 {
00278     CURLcode code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_URL, uri);
00279     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00280     {
00281         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP GET request: "
00282                   "Failed to set URL (%d).", code);
00283         return -1;
00284     }
00285 
00286     // Cleanup input buffer
00287     *(handle->inputBuffer) = '\0';
00288     handle->inputBufferFree = handle->inputBufferSize - 1;
00289 
00290     // Retrieve content of the URL
00291     code = curl_easy_perform(handle->curl);
00292     // allow server empty responses
00293     if ((code != CURLE_OK) && (code != CURLE_GOT_NOTHING))
00294     {
00295         log_error("HTTP request to \"%s\" failed (%d): %s.",
00296                   uri, code, handle->errorBuffer);
00297         return -1;
00298     }
00299 
00300     log_debug("CURL received input:\n%s", handle->inputBuffer);
00301 
00302     return 0;
00303 }
00304 
00305 int curl_ext_get(CURL_EXT* handle, const char* uri)
00306 {
00307     // perform HTTP GET operation
00308     CURLcode code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_HTTPGET, 1L);
00309     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00310     {
00311         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP GET request: "
00312                   "Failed to switch to GET (%d).", code);
00313         return -1;
00314     }
00315 
00316     return sendRequest(handle, uri);
00317 }

00412 
00413 int curl_ext_put(CURL_EXT* handle, const char* uri)
00414 {
00415     // perform HTTP PUT operation
00416     CURLcode code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, 1L);
00417     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00418     {
00419         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP PUT request: "
00420                   "Failed to switch to PUT (%d).", code);
00421         return -1;
00422     }
00423 
00424     // Reset output counters
00425     handle->outputPos = 0;
00426     if (handle->outputBuffer == NULL)
00427     {
00428         // Do not allow empty PUT requests
00429         log_error("Trying to perform PUT request with empty body.");
00430         return -1;
00431     }
00432     handle->outputSize = strlen(handle->outputBuffer);
00433 
00434     // Set output length
00435     code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, handle->outputSize);
00436     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00437     {
00438         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP PUT request: "
00439                   "Failed to set output size (%d).", code);
00440         return -1;
00441     }
00442 
00443     log_debug("CURL sending data:\n%s", handle->outputBuffer);
00444     return sendRequest(handle, uri);
00445 }
00446 
00447 int curl_ext_post(CURL_EXT* handle, const char* uri)
00448 {
00449     // perform HTTP POST operation
00450     // have to set explicitly upload mode to 0, otherwise
00451     // PUT will be used instead of POST
00452     CURLcode code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_UPLOAD, 0L);
00453     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00454     {
00455         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP POST request: "
00456                   "Failed to switch of upload (%d).", code);
00457         return -1;
00458     }
00459 
00460     code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_POST, 1L);
00461     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00462     {
00463         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP POST request: "
00464                   "Failed to switch to POST (%d).", code);
00465         return -1;
00466     }
00467 
00468     // Reset output counters
00469     handle->outputPos = 0;
00470     // allow empty body of POST request
00471     if (handle->outputBuffer == NULL)
00472     {
00473         handle->outputSize = 0;
00474     }
00475     else
00476     {
00477         handle->outputSize = strlen(handle->outputBuffer);
00478     }
00479 
00480     // Set output length
00481     code = curl_easy_setopt(handle->curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDSIZE, handle->outputSize);
00482     if (code != CURLE_OK)
00483     {
00484         log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP POST request: "
00485                   "Failed to set output size (%d).", code);
00486         return -1;
00487     }
00488 
00489     log_debug("CURL sending data:\n%s", handle->outputBuffer);
00490     return sendRequest(handle, uri);
00491 }
00492 
00493 static int parseXmlInput(CURL_EXT* handle, IXML_Document** doc)
00494 {
00495     if (*(handle->inputBuffer) == '\0')
00496     {   // we do not consider empty answer as an error
00497         *doc = NULL;
00498         return 0;
00499     }
00500 
00501     int error = ixmlParseBufferEx(handle->inputBuffer, doc);
00502     if (error != IXML_SUCCESS)
00503     {
00504         log_error("Server response is not an XML document (error %d):\n%s",
00505                   error, handle->inputBuffer);
00506         return -1;
00507     }
00508 
00509     return 0;
00510 }

00512 int curl_ext_getDOM(CURL_EXT* handle, const char* uri, IXML_Document** response)
00513 {
00514     int error = curl_ext_get(handle, uri);
00515     if (error != 0)
00516     {
00517         return error;
00518     }
00519 
00520     return parseXmlInput(handle, response);
00521 }
